languages.text: "Не сомневайтесь. Он был доблестным блюстителем, но имел порок — доверял соратникам. Я его лишена и не верю никому, кроме вас, Лорд-капитан".
"You can be sure of that. He was a fine enforcer, but suffered from the fatal flaw of trusting his associates. I myself lack that weakness and trust no one except you, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Не сомневайтесь. Он был доблестным блюстителем, но имел порок — доверял соратникам. Я его лишена и не верю никому, кроме вас, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "You can be sure of that. He was a fine enforcer, but suffered from trusting his associates. I lack that flaw and trust no one except you, Lord Captain."
"You can be sure of that. He was a fine enforcer, but suffered from trusting his associates. I lack that flaw and trust no one except you, Lord Captain."
"You can be sure of that. He was a fine enforcer, but suffered from the fatal flaw trusting his associates. I myself lack that weakness and trust no one except you, Lord Captain."
"You can be sure of that. He was a fine enforcer, but suffered from the fatal flaw trusting his associates. I myself lack that weakness and trust no one except you, Lord Captain."
"You can be sure of that. He was a fine enforcer, but suffered from the fatal flaw of trusting his associates. I myself lack that weakness and trust no one except you, Lord Captain."
"You can be sure of that. He was a fine enforcer, but suffered from the fatal flaw of trusting his associates. I myself lack that weakness and trust no one except you, Lord Captain."

languages.text: « Aucun risque. C'était un bon prévôt, mais il avait un défaut de taille : il faisait confiance à ses associés. Je n'ai pas cette faiblesse et ne fais confiance à personne d'autre qu'à vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "You can be sure of that. He was a fine enforcer, but suffered from the fatal flaw of trusting his associates. I myself lack that weakness and trust no one except you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Aucun risque. C'était un bon prévôt, mais il avait un défaut de taille : il faisait confiance à ses associés. Je n'ai pas cette faiblesse et ne fais confiance à personne d'autre qu'à vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: «De eso puede estar segur{mf|o|a}. Era excelente en su trabajo, pero sufría el terrible defecto de confiar en sus socios. Yo carezco de esa falta y no confío en nadie que no sea usted, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "You can be sure of that. He was a fine enforcer, but suffered from the fatal flaw of trusting his associates. I myself lack that weakness and trust no one except you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «De eso puede estar segur{mf|o|a}. Era excelente en su trabajo, pero sufría el terrible defecto de confiar en sus socios. Yo carezco de esa falta y no confío en nadie que no sea usted, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: “这点您可以保证。他是位出色的执法者，但他有个致命的弱点，那就是他信任他的伙伴。我没有这样的弱点。除了您之外，我不相信任何人，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "You can be sure of that. He was a fine enforcer, but suffered from the fatal flaw of trusting his associates. I myself lack that weakness and trust no one except you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “这点您可以保证。他是位出色的执法者，但他有个致命的弱点，那就是他信任他的伙伴。我没有这样的弱点。除了您之外，我不相信任何人，舰长大人。”

languages.text: 「それは確かな事だ。彼は優秀なエンフォーサーだったが、仲間を信用してしまうという致命的な欠点がありました。だが私は違う。あなたは以外は誰も信用していません、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "You can be sure of that. He was a fine enforcer, but suffered from the fatal flaw of trusting his associates. I myself lack that weakness and trust no one except you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「それは確かな事だ。彼は優秀なエンフォーサーだったが、仲間を信用してしまうという致命的な欠点がありました。だが私は違う。あなたは以外は誰も信用していません、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: "Da könnt Ihr Euch sicher sein. Er war ein guter Enforcer, hat jedoch den kapitalen Fehler begangen, seinen Kameraden zu vertrauen. Ich selbst bin frei von dieser Schwäche und vertraue niemandem außer Euch, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "You can be sure of that. He was a fine enforcer, but suffered from the fatal flaw of trusting his associates. I myself lack that weakness and trust no one except you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Da könnt Ihr Euch sicher sein. Er war ein guter Enforcer, hat jedoch den kapitalen Fehler begangen, seinen Kameraden zu vertrauen. Ich selbst bin frei von dieser Schwäche und vertraue niemandem außer Euch, Lord Captain."

languages.text: "Bundan emin olabilirsiniz. Kendisi iyi bir infazcıydı ancak çalıştığı insanlara güvenmek gibi ölümcül bir kusurdan muzdaripti. Şahsımda böyle bir zayıflık olmayıp sizden başka hiç kimseye güvenmem Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "You can be sure of that. He was a fine enforcer, but suffered from the fatal flaw of trusting his associates. I myself lack that weakness and trust no one except you, Lord Captain."
